text: I was looking for this as well.  You can't include the HubSpot image_slider_gallery or a dnd_area within a custom module. I use css grids and flex objects to create columns in my modules, but that's a workaround and not a good long-term solution because you are then removing the dnd_area capability.  So, you are left with deciding whether to forgo responsiveness for portrait tablet mode to have dnd capability or give up dnd capability for responsiveness.

Hey <@U062STEC9Q8>, please avoid posting the same question in multiple channels, as it <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#channel-and-user-spamming|goes against our code of conduc>t. I'll be deleting this post.
